title: BungeeCord 提示此消息 如何解决
author: CubeTian

replies.txt_content:
似乎图gg了 手打一下
"The server you were previosly on went down,you have been connected a fallback server"

"The server you were previosly on went down,you have been connected a fallback s ...
你没有吧自己设置为BC管理员，请在BC的配置文件里设置   ~~~求采纳

replies.author: Lss233
replies.txt_content:
请问是什么时候出现的

这句话的意思是 你之前（上次下线）所在的服务器现在没开，所以你已经被连接到了大厅服务器。
